title: "IBM Security to acquire endpoint security platform startup ReaQta"
excerpt: "IBM Security today announced that it has entered an agreement BV for an undisclosed price. Founded in 2014, ReaQta offers an endpoint security platform that leverages artificial intelligence to identify and manage threats while remaining undetectable to adversaries automatically."
